item.description:
Last Minute Rescheduling!

Sept 27th at 6pm

We will be organizing in the Watertown Free Library, upstairs at in the Lucia Mastrangelo Room.

We are returning to our "Home Base" of the Watertown Library to reorganize this group. It has been a few months since our last meet up, so we are using this time as an opportunity to reconnect, review our goals, share experiences, and meet and greet with fellow local business professionals.

 

DISCUSSION TOPIC:

How best to position yourself as a RESOURCE to your COMMUNITY.

What product or service do you provide in your community? How can you help connect others in a positive light? How can you accomplish SUCCESS, as you define it?  

 

HOW WE WILL KNOW IF THIS MEETING WILL BE SUCCESSFUL ...

- You meet new people when you attend

- You follow up with the attendees, grab coffee or lunch, and build professional relationships

- You learn more about what other people are passionate about

- You gain a fresh perspective on your world.

 

Join us and share this event with your friends!
item.name: Back to the Watertown Library!
